item.title: XNA Source: Particle engine / menu renderer
item.description: A few years ago I implemented a particle engine and a flexible menu creator in XNA. They were written for a game that was never completed, but I thought I would post up them up here in case anyone wants to use them. Google Code repo for game prototype Quick link to UI Manager Quick link to particle engine source
